907 Islam is incompatible with civilization ☪️                            ☪️ posted 5 days ago by DingleBalls 42 comments award share report block Robert J. O'Neill @mchooyah • 5d Yeah, and them pesky Jehovah’s Witnesses always choppin’ off peoples’ heads… Ariana Jasmine @arianajasmine__ • 6d To everyone who thinks Zohran Mamdani will force New York to be Muslim: A Muslim has never knocked on my door trying to convince me to convert. Just saying.

If muslims acted more like him I wouldn't have a problem with them. permalink parent award report block reply Im_RickSteves_bitch 20 points 5 days ago They don’t convince.
